label: Kindness Matters
description: Make this world a better place with one act of kindness- one word, one look, one smile- create a kindness ripple. Take time to appreciate the ways in which kindness can make all the difference with these titles.

list.label: The Boy, the Mole, the Fox and the Horse
Dare to be kind : how extraordinary compassion can transform our world
Good morning, I love you : mindfulness + self-compassion practices to rewire your brain for calm, clarity + joy
The little book of lykke : secrets of the world's happiest people
A short guide to a happy life
Spirit junkie : a radical road to self-love and miracles
This I believe II : more personal philosophies of remarkable men and women
